text: Unke Rasoolon ne kaha “kya khuda ke barey mein Shakk hai jo aasmano aur zameen ka khaliq hai? Woh tumhein bula raha hai taa-ke tumhare kasoor maaf karey aur tumko ek muddat-e-muqarrar tak mohlat de”. Unhon ne jawab diya “ tum kuch nahin ho magar waise hi Insaan jaise hum hain , tum humein un hastiyon ki bandagi se rokna chahte ho jinki bandagi baap dada se hoti chali aa rahi hai, accha to lao koi sareeh sanad(clear proof)”
